head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths THOMAS, CHARLES ROBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths THOMAS, CHARLES ROBERT

block.p: THOMAS-Charles Robert. 83, on September 24, 2000, in Cambridge, NY, formerly of Brooklyn. Beloved husband of Winifred A. (nee Taylor), and loving father of Bob, Liz, John, Mary Ann, Stephen, David, and Brian. Devoted grandfather and great grandfather. Also survived by a sister, Virginia Thomas, of Fort Walton Beach, FL.
